title: BMW's Legacy with Michelin
description:
SPONSORED CONTENT: Michelin engineers developed their latest high-performance tires to enhance the performance of BMW’s top drivers’ cars. 

Today, every single BMW M series is fitted exclusively with Michelin Pilot Super Sport tires. Six models, totaling more than 3100 horsepower. And all that power and performance from car to road through Michelin rubber.
tags: BMW, Michelin, tires, Bimmer, BMW M Series
